channel.title: CVE Feed for PickPlugins -- Product Slider for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PickPlugins -- Product Slider for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-45459|2024-09-15T07:41:38.095Z -- pickplugins -- product%20slider%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Product Slider for WooCommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Product Slider for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.13.50.
